gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka

Class KafkaAvroExtractor<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.instrumented.extractor.InstrumentedExtractorBase<S,D>
      • gobblin.instrumented.extractor.InstrumentedExtractor<S,D>
        • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.EventBasedExtractor<S,D>
          • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.KafkaExtractor<Schema,GenericRecord>
            • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.KafkaAvroExtractor<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instrumentable, Extractor<Schema,GenericRecord>, FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public abstract class KafkaAvroExtractor<K>
extends KafkaExtractor<Schema,GenericRecord>
    An abstract implementation of Extractor for Kafka, where events are in Avro format. Subclasses should implement getRecordSchema(byte[]) and getDecoder(byte[]). Additionally, if schema registry is not used (i.e., property KafkaSchemaRegistry.KAFKA_SCHEMA_REGISTRY_CLASS is not specified, method getExtractorSchema() should be overriden.

      • getExtractorSchema

        protected Optional<Schema> getExtractorSchema()
        Get the schema to be used by this extractor. All extracted records that have different schemas will be converted to this schema.

      • readRecordImpl

        public GenericRecord readRecordImpl(GenericRecord reuse)
                             throws DataRecordException,
                                    IOException
        Description copied from class: KafkaExtractor
        Return the next decodable record from the current partition. If the current partition has no more decodable record, move on to the next partition. If all partitions have been processed, return null.
